Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory9.jpg'}
{3: 'The city you are walking through is eerily silent. All you can hear is the snowfall and the wind howling.'}
{2: 'Huff... Puff... A-are we there yet?', 3: '5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'We are close, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "It's already the middle of the night. I'm not sure if you are accustomed to the temperature. And the continuous battles... must be weighing on you.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With Bianca leading you, your journey to meet Karenina has been fairly calm.'}
{3: 'On her own, Karenina seems to be less forceful and odd than usual.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karen, what are you doing here?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Her hood is covered with a thin layer of snow. It appears that she has been waiting for quite a while.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Bianca's capabilities aside, the fact that you've arrived with 【kuroname】in one piece tells me that someone's not being a giant pain in the butt.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Although her expression is as animated as ever, you can tell that Karenina is purposefully lowering her voice.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "What's our situation here, Karen?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Karenina holds her finger to her lips, indicating you to be quiet.'}
{3: 'Your eyes follow the direction she is pointing, and you find the CUB hovering, perfectly still, as if monitoring something.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I did discover some unusual tracks, which was why I ran off earlier. But things aren't what I expected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I've discovered a trail that suggests a mechanoid on the move from where we are to where the CUB is. That's how I put all our clues together...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, you hear a low-frequency warning broadcasted from where the CUB is hovering.'}
{3: 'Karenina is the first to respond. She jumps to her feet and dashes toward the CUB.'}
{2: 'Where are you going, Karenina?'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I've set the CUB to hunt mode. You don't need to rush!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bianca raises her voice toward Karenina to no avail. Frustrated, she also chases after her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Stop wasting time—【kuroname】! Follow!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina turns to look at you confidently.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Stamina shouldn't be a problem for you?", 4: '1'}
{2: '...Of course not!', 3: '36', 4: "I'm only human!", 5: '37'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Keep up, then!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You can rest afterward! I'll see you at the finish line!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory307.png'}
{3: 'Susurrus... Kllkllk...'}
{2: 'Strange Voice', 3: '～Where are you from?～'}
{2: 'Strange Voice', 3: '～Do roses bloom in your garden?～'}
{2: 'Strange Voice', 3: '～And where are you going?～'}
{2: 'Strange Voice', 3: '～When you wake, do people sing?～'}
{3: 'The young girl softly hums her made-up melody, her delightful voice sounding especially pleasant in the calm and silent ruins.'}
{3: 'Behind the singing girl inside the shadow, however, lurks a chilling presence.'}
{3: 'The girl is not concerned, or maybe she has not noticed the sound of mechanical parts slowly approaching.'}
{2: 'That voice... sounds familiar...', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Commandant! Take cover!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if she has noticed something, Karenina strikes proactively. Her CUB also activates at the same moment.'}
{3: 'Karenina becomes extra nervous as she notices who her targets are surrounding.'}
{3: 'It is indeed a familiar voice—perhaps that is why Karenina is so eager to chase her down in the first place.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Bianca, I'll count on your support!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey! We're coming to save you!", 4: '1'}
